column2: Latest;Kampot:------ Two men are in a critical condition after an accident at a construction site in Kampot city.------The incident happened at 9:20 am on April 1
column4: when a 23 year old and 26 year old were electrocuted.------According to the source
column5: two victims were working with scaffolding when they touched live wires.------Both men are currently in hospital.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/426996
